compliant.legal provisions: The purpose of data collection must be specified.
The types of personal data collected must be specified.

compliant.section: 四.個人資料利用之期間、地區、對象及方式
compliant.legal provisions: The retention period and usage of personal data must be specified.
Appropriate security measures must be taken to protect personal data.
Data subjects have the right to access, correct, and delete their personal data.

compliant.section: 六.隱私權保護聲明的修改
compliant.legal provisions: The privacy policy must be updated in accordance with legal changes.
Contact information for inquiries must be provided.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The use of cookies must be clearly stated, including obtaining consent for tracking.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the need for explicit consent for the use of cookies and tracking technologies.

non_compliant.section: 五.與第三者共用個人資料
non_compliant.legal provisions: Sharing personal data with third parties must be clearly defined and consent obtained.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the conditions under which personal data may be shared with third parties and ensure consent is obtained.
